Package game

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OthelloGame
    public interface Game
    A representation of a game that can be played on the board.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Board getBoard()
      Returns the board of the game.
      Player getCurrent()
      Returns the current player of the game.
      Player[] getPlayers()
      Returns an array with the players of the game.
      void makeMove​(int index)
      Makes a move on the board of this game for the current player.
      void pass()
      Changes the current player's turn to the other one.
      java.lang.String update()
      Returns the current situation of the game on the board.

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        void makeMove​(int index)
       throws IllegalMoveException,
              InvalidFieldException
        Makes a move on the board of this game for the current player.
        Parameters:
        index - the index on the board where to put the mark.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - when the move is not possible.
        InvalidFieldException - when the index is not a valid field on the board.

      • update

        java.lang.String update()
        Returns the current situation of the game on the board.
        Returns:
        representation of the current board.

      • getCurrent

        Player getCurrent()
        Returns the current player of the game.
        Returns:
        the current player of the game.

      • getBoard

        Board getBoard()
        Returns the board of the game.
        Returns:
        the board of the game.

      • getPlayers

        Player[] getPlayers()
        Returns an array with the players of the game.
        Returns:
        the players of the game as an array.

      • pass

        void pass()
        Changes the current player's turn to the other one.
